sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RESTIO , in botany ; a genus of the triandria or-der, belonging to the diœcia claſs of plants. The male calyx is an ovate ſpike of membranaceous ſcales ; the corolla is proper, hexapetalous, and perſiſtent. The fe-male calyx and corolla are as in the male ; the germen is roundiſh, and sex-sulcated ; there are three erect and perſiſtent ſtyles ; the capſule is roundiſh, with fix plaits, and is roſtrated and trilocular; the feeds are oblong and cylindrical.
